entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `text` TEXT NOT NULL, `translation` TEXT NOT NULL)

indices.name: index_word_table_text
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_word_table_text` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`text`)
